[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1482199625086{margin-top: -40px !important;}”][vc_column bgcolor=”#fafcfd”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1578737172078{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}” el_id=”board-of-directors”][vc_column_inner]

Download Important Forms Here.

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1646221618454{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}”]

Customer Request Form Download
Account Opening Form Individual Download
Account Opening Form Non Individual Download
FACTA-Form-Individual Download
Loan Application Form Download
RTGS NEFT Form Download
Call Form Download
Fixed Deposit Renewal Form (For Institution) Download
Value Added Services Form (ATM, Internet/Mobile Banking) Download
Internet Banking form – Retail users Download
Internet Banking form – Corporate Users Download
Request for activation of Dormant/In-Operative account Download
GSC Bank Unclaimed Deposits Claim Form & Process Download
Nominee Addition, Modification & Deletion Form Download
Aadhaar Linking Form Download

[/vc_column_text]

For Individuals

[vc_column_text]

  • Please fill this form and submit it at your home branch.
  • Please carry your KYC document in original for verification at branch.

[/vc_column_text]

For Corporates (Banks & Societies)

[vc_column_text]

  • Identify your bank official, by name, as to who will be accessing the account/s maintained at GSC Bank. Please arrange to fill and send us the signed and stamped copy of the ‘Value Added Services’ form along with below details:
    1. Board resolution needs to be submitted confirming name of bank official.
    2. Bank official’s mobile number and KYC document.
    3. Bank Address to which the login/transaction password will be sent (Once financial module is activated

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

For More Information Contact us at Land-line: 079-27459000/1/2

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column bgcolor=”#ffffff”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
